body:
The only dance masters I could have were Jean-Jacques Rousseau, Walt Whitman and Nietzsche.
What is reading, but silent conversation.
In the name of Hypocrites, doctors have invented the most exquisite form of torture ever known to man: survival.
The man that blushes is not quite a brute.
If your strength is small, don't carry heavy burdens. If your words are worthless, don't give advice.
No wild enthusiast could rest, till half the world like him was possessed.
It is better to dwell in the wilderness, than with a contentious and angry woman. [Proverbs 21:19]
Be true to the best you know. This is your high ideal. If you do your best, you cannot do more.
As a general truth, it is safe to say that any picture that produces a moral impression is a bad picture.
Accuracy is to a newspaper what virtue is to a lady, but a newspaper can always print a retraction.
Let us not be ashamed to speak what we shame not to think.
When we cannot find contentment in ourselves, it is useless to seek it elsewhere.
A well begun is half ended.
Failure is success if we learn from it.
You don't want to get the same kind of advice from everyone on your board.
Draw the curtain, the fraud is over.
If one age believes too much it is natural that another believes too little.
A wise man changes his mind, a fool never will.
To succeed in business it is necessary to make others see things as you see them.
